name: Stuck in a loop (NarrowGame)
description:
A short horror/parkour game made by Narrow Game.

This Game Contains Loud noises, jumpscares And Scaring elements that can be uncomfortable or even harmful for some people who suffer from diseases like epilepsy or heart problems or other than that.

Note: you should check the input before playing the game:

*WASD for movement (for QWERTY keyboards.)

*Spacebar for jumping

*Left Shift for running (Pressed with the forward button W)

Recommended volume : 65% - 100% Update 1.1:

-Many glitches and bugs fixed.

-Better sound quality

-Fixed bugs related to the loop

-Better Post Processing

Twitter: https://twitter.com/NarrowGame0 If you face any bugs or problems with the game, please tell me in the comments section.
